Object.Field:
create table SNP_ACTION (
I_TXT_DESC DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
I_ACTION DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
ACTION_NAME VARCHAR(400) NOT NULL ,
ACTION_TYPE DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_GRP_ACTION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_AGENT (
I_AGENT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
AGENT_NAME VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
HOST_NAME VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
HOST_PORT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
MAX_THREAD DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
AGENT_NAME2 VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
I_ESS DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
APPLICATION_NAME VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
PROTOCOL VARCHAR(10) NULL ,
SCHED_CLEANUP_HH VARCHAR(2) NULL ,
SCHED_CLEANUP_MM VARCHAR(2) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_AGENT_PROP (
I_AGENT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
PROP_KEY VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL ,
PROP_VALUE VARCHAR(150) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_AGENT_PROP_LST (
PROP_KEY VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL ,
PROP_TYPE VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL ,
PROP_DEFAULT_VALUE VARCHAR(150) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

I_AGENT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_CONNECT (
I_CONNECT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_TECHNO DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_HOST DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
CON_NAME VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
DSERV_NAME VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
CONNECT_TYPE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL ,
IND_JNDI VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL ,
JAVA_DRIVER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
JAVA_URL VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
JNDI_AUTHENT VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
JNDI_PROTO VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
JNDI_FACTORY VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
JNDI_URL VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
JNDI_RESSOURCE VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
JNDI_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
JNDI_PWD VARCHAR(150) NULL ,
USER_NAME VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
PASS VARCHAR(150) NULL ,
FETCH_ARRAY_SERV DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
BATCH_UPDATE_SIZE DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
I_TXT_JNDI_URL DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
WS_DEPLOY_MODE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
I_TXT_WS_BASE_URL DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_TXT_JAVA_URL DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
ON_CON_CMD LONGTEXT NULL ,
ON_CON_IND_ERR VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ON_CON_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ON_CON_LOG_LEVEL VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ON_CON_APPLY_COND VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
ON_DCN_CMD LONGTEXT NULL ,
ON_DCN_IND_ERR VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ON_DCN_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ON_DCN_LOG_LEVEL VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
ON_DCN_APPLY_COND VARCHAR(50) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_CONNECT_PROP (
PROP_KEY VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL ,
I_CONNECT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
PROP_VALUE VARCHAR(250) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_CONTEXT (
I_CONTEXT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,

CONF_PASSW VARCHAR(35) NULL ,

LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,

EXT_VERSION VARCHAR(35) NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

I_TARG_TECHNO DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
TARG_DT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_DATA (

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_DT (
I_DT DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_TECHNO DECIMAL(10) NULL ,

LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
WRITABLE_DT VARCHAR(250) NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

ID_SEQ DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

FF_CODE VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
I_INSTANCE DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_OBJECTS DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
NUM_VALUE DECIMAL(10) NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_FIELD (
I_FIELD DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_TECHNO (
I_TECHNO DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
TECHNO_NAME VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
TECH_INT_NAME VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
EXE_CHANEL VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
SQL_CAP VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
WHERE_CAP VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
IND_FILE_PARAM VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
IND_DSERVER VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
DSERVER_TERM VARCHAR(20) NULL ,
IND_CATALOG VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
CATALOG_TERM VARCHAR(20) NULL ,
IND_SCHEMA VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
SCHEMA_TERM VARCHAR(20) NULL ,
COL_ALIAS_WORD VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
TAB_ALIAS_WORD VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
EXP_ORDER_BY VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
EXP_HAVING VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
EXP_GROUP_BY VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
JOIN_CAP VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
JOIN_CROSS VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
JOIN_IN VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
JOIN_LEFT_OUT VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
JOIN_RIGHT_OUT VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
JOIN_FULL VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
JOIN_CLAUSE_ON VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
JOIN_OUTER VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
JOIN_OUTER_SIDE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
JOIN_OUTER_BA VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
JOIN_OUTER_LOC VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
JOIN_BRACE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
MAX_COL_NAME_LEN DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
MAX_TAB_NAME_LEN DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
DATE_FCT VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
REM_OBJ_PATTERN VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
LOC_OBJ_PATTERN VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
DDL_NULL VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DDL_VARCHAR_MASK VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DDL_NUMERIC_MASK VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DDL_DATE_MASK VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
IND_LOGICAL VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
IND_PHYSICAL VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
GET_DATE_REQUEST VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DDL_LONGRAW_MASK VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
I_AK_TXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_INDEX_TXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_CHECK_TXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_PK_TXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_FK_TXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
EXEC_PLAN_REQUEST VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
INT_VERSION DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
IND_SEQUENCE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
I_SEQ_TXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
GET_SEQ_REQUEST VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
LOC_SEQ_PATTERN VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
REM_SEQ_PATTERN VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
SUB_PART_PATTERN VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
IND_PARTITION VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
PART_PATTERN VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
IND_SUPP_SET_OPERATOR VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
IND_SUPP_DRVD_TBL VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
IND_SUPP_SEL_LK VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
SET_OPERATOR_LST VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
JOIN_NATURAL VARCHAR(50) NULL ,
DEF_INT_PRF_TAB VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DEF_COL_PRF_TAB VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DEF_ERR_PRF_TAB VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DEF_JRN_PRF_TAB VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DEF_JRN_PRF_VIE VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DEF_JRN_PRF_TRG VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
DEF_IDX_PRF_TAB VARCHAR(25) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_USER (
I_WUSER DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
WUSER_NAME VARCHAR(400) NOT NULL ,
WUSER_INIT VARCHAR(3) NULL ,
PASS VARCHAR(150) NULL ,
AUT_SUPERVISOR VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR(1) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR(35) NULL ,
EXPIRACY_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
I_TXT_DETAIL DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
USER_EXPIRACY_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
GUID_EXTERNAL VARCHAR(50) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_USER_METH (
I_WUSER DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_METH DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
GENERIC_PRIV VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_USER_OBJ_METH (
I_WUSER DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_METH DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_CONTEXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_OBJECTS DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
I_INSTANCE DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_USER_PREF (
I_WUSER DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_PREF DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_USER_PROF (
I_WUSER DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_PROF DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_U_O_M_REP (
I_METH DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_CONTEXT DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
I_WUSER DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
REP_ID DECIMAL(3) NOT NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
I_INSTANCE DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
I_OBJECTS DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC

create table SNP_VERSION (
I_OBJECTS DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
I_INSTANCE DECIMAL(10) NOT NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL ,
VERSION_COMMENT VARCHAR(250) NULL ,
I_DATA DECIMAL(10) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATETIME NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
INSTANCE_NAME VARCHAR(400) NULL ,
I_TXT_COMMENT DECIMAL(10) NULL
) ENGINE = InnoDB ROW_FORMAT = DYNAMIC
